body:
Well, the world cup is happening now, and its wonderful.
but for people in singapore...not so much.
In almost every place in the world you can watch the entire world cup for free, or for less than 20 dollars.
In singapore however, we need to pay 120 dollars :)
My father couldnt take this, and we managed to cut our way through the system.
We bought a legal VPN for 10 singapore dollars, and I can now watch the entire world cup through IVT while connected to a UK server .
Dont mess with me bud...
